process.description: Example Process for uploading Excel spreadsheet records into an existing Collection
process.name: Excel Spreadsheet Records to Collection Records Example
process.bpmn:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:pm="http://processmaker.com/BPMN/2.0/Schema.xsd" xmlns:tns="http://sourceforge.net/bpmn/definitions/_1530553328908" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" exporter="ProcessMaker Modeler" exporterVersion="1.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL http://bpmn.sourceforge.net/schemas/BPMN20.xsd">
  <bpmn:process id="ProcessId" name="ProcessName" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:startEvent id="node_1" name="Start Event" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:config="{"web_entry":{"require_valid_session":false,"mode":"DISABLED","screen_id":null,"completed_action":"SCREEN","completed_screen_id":null,"completed_url":null,"authenticatable_type":"ProcessMaker\\Models\\User","authenticatable_id":1,"enable_query_params":false,"password":null,"enable_password_protect":false,"exclude_data":[]}}">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_9</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:scriptTask id="node_4" name="Process File" pm:config="{
    "fileVariableName": "recordsFile",
    "recordsVariableName": "persons"
}" pm:scriptRef="58">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_10</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_11</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:scriptTask>
    <bpmn:scriptTask id="node_5" name="Save to Collection" pm:config="{
    "recordsVariableName": "persons",
    "collectionId": 18
}" pm:scriptRef="59">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_12</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_13</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:scriptTask>
    <bpmn:task id="node_6" name="Upload File" pm:screenRef="222" pm:allowInterstitial="true" pm:interstitialScreenRef="220" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"web_entry":{"require_valid_session":false,"mode":"DISABLED","screen_id":null,"completed_action":"SCREEN","completed_screen_id":null,"completed_url":null,"authenticatable_type":"ProcessMaker\\Models\\User","authenticatable_id":1,"enable_query_params":false,"password":null,"enable_password_protect":false,"exclude_data":[]},"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_9</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:incoming>node_15</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_10</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:task id="node_7" name="Review Upload" pm:screenRef="223" pm:allowInterstitial="true" pm:interstitialScreenRef="220" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"web_entry":{"require_valid_session":false,"mode":"DISABLED","screen_id":null,"completed_action":"SCREEN","completed_screen_id":null,"completed_url":null,"authenticatable_type":"ProcessMaker\\Models\\User","authenticatable_id":1,"enable_query_params":false,"password":null,"enable_password_protect":false,"exclude_data":[]},"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_11</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_3</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_8" name="End Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_13</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_9" name="" sourceRef="node_1" targetRef="node_6"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_10" name="" sourceRef="node_6" targetRef="node_4"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_11" name="" sourceRef="node_4" targetRef="node_7"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_13" name="" sourceRef="node_5" targetRef="node_8"/>
    <bpmn:exclusiveGateway id="node_2" name="Upload OK?">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_3</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_12</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_15</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:exclusiveGateway>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_3" name="" sourceRef="node_7" targetRef="node_2"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_12" name="Save" sourceRef="node_2" targetRef="node_5">
      <bpmn:conditionExpression xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression">requestStatus == "save"</bpmn:conditionExpression>
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_15" name="Reupload " sourceRef="node_2" targetRef="node_6">
      <bpmn:conditionExpression xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression">requestStatus == "reupload"</bpmn:conditionExpression>
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
  </bpmn:process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagramId">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlaneId" bpmnElement="ProcessId">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_1_di" bpmnElement="node_1">
        <dc:Bounds x="100" y="180" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_4_di" bpmnElement="node_4">
        <dc:Bounds x="376" y="160" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_5_di" bpmnElement="node_5">
        <dc:Bounds x="820" y="160" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_6_di" bpmnElement="node_6">
        <dc:Bounds x="200" y="160" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_7_di" bpmnElement="node_7">
        <dc:Bounds x="550" y="160" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_8_di" bpmnElement="node_8">
        <dc:Bounds x="970" y="180" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_9_di" bpmnElement="node_9">
        <di:waypoint x="118" y="198"/>
        <di:waypoint x="258" y="198"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_10_di" bpmnElement="node_10">
        <di:waypoint x="258" y="198"/>
        <di:waypoint x="434" y="198"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_11_di" bpmnElement="node_11">
        <di:waypoint x="434" y="198"/>
        <di:waypoint x="608" y="198"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_13_di" bpmnElement="node_13">
        <di:waypoint x="878" y="198"/>
        <di:waypoint x="988" y="198"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_2_di" bpmnElement="node_2">
        <dc:Bounds x="730" y="180" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_3_di" bpmnElement="node_3">
        <di:waypoint x="608" y="198"/>
        <di:waypoint x="748" y="198"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_12_di" bpmnElement="node_12">
        <di:waypoint x="748" y="198"/>
        <di:waypoint x="878" y="198"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_15_di" bpmnElement="node_15">
        <di:waypoint x="748" y="198"/>
        <di:waypoint x="748" y="300"/>
        <di:waypoint x="258" y="300"/>
        <di:waypoint x="258" y="198"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</bpmn:definitions>

scripts.title: Read Excel File to Json
scripts.description: Reads an Excel File to JSON
scripts.code:
<?php 
/*  
 *  Welcome to ProcessMaker 4 Script Editor 
 *  To access Environment Variables use get_env("ENV_VAR_NAME") 
 *  To access Request Data use $data 
 *  To access Configuration Data use $config 
 *  To preview your script, click the Run button using the provided input and config data 
 *  Return an array and it will be merged with the processes data 
 *  Example API to retrieve user email by their ID $api->users()->getUserById(1)['email'] 
 *  API Documentation https://github.com/ProcessMaker/sdk-php#documentation-for-api-endpoints 
 */

// Initialise variables
use \PhpOffice\PhpSpreadsheet\IOFactory;

$pmheaders = [
    'Authorization' => 'Bearer ' . getenv('API_TOKEN'),        
    'Accept'        => 'application/json',
];
$apiHost = getenv('API_HOST');
$client = new GuzzleHttp\Client(['verify' => false]);
$requestId = $data['_request']['id'];
$fileVariable = $config["fileVariableName"];
$recordsVariable = $config["recordsVariableName"];
$records = array();
$fileProcessStatus = "Initalised";
$file = null;


 //Get Files in Request
 
$res = $client->request('GET', $apiHost . "/requests/$requestId/files", [
    'headers' => $pmheaders
]);

$files = json_decode($res->getBody(), true);

if (isset($files["data"]) && count($files["data"]) > 0){
    foreach($files["data"] as $fileData) {
        if ($fileVariable == $fileData["custom_properties"]["data_name"]) {
            $file = $fileData;
            break;
        }
    }
}

// Download file
if ($file === null) {
    $fileProcessStatus = "File field not found. Check Process Configuration";
} else {
    $fileId = $file["id"];
    $filePath = "/tmp/" . $file["file_name"];

    $res = $client->request('GET', $apiHost . "/files/$fileId/contents", [
        'headers' => $pmheaders,
        'sink' => $filePath
    ]);

    $fileProcessStatus = "File Downloaded";

    //Read Excel File
    $spreadsheet = IOFactory::load($filePath);

    $sheetData = $spreadsheet->getActiveSheet()->toArray(null, true, true, false);

    //It is assume sheet has headers matching record columns 
    $headers = $sheetData[0];
    
    for ($i = 1; $i < count($sheetData); $i++) {
        $row = array();
        for ($j = 0; $j < count($headers); $j++){
            $row["$headers[$j]"] = $sheetData[$i][$j];
        }
        array_push($records, json_decode(json_encode($row), FALSE));
    }

    $fileProcessStatus = "File Processed Successfully";
}


 return [
     "fileProcessStatus" => $fileProcessStatus,
     "$recordsVariable" => $records
 ];

scripts.title: Save Records to Collection
scripts.description: Saves data from records to a collection
scripts.code:
<?php 
/*  
 *  Welcome to ProcessMaker 4 Script Editor 
 *  To access Environment Variables use get_env("ENV_VAR_NAME") 
 *  To access Request Data use $data 
 *  To access Configuration Data use $config 
 *  To preview your script, click the Run button using the provided input and config data 
 *  Return an array and it will be merged with the processes data 
 *  Example API to retrieve user email by their ID $api->users()->getUserById(1)['email'] 
 *  API Documentation https://github.com/ProcessMaker/sdk-php#documentation-for-api-endpoints 
 */

$pmheaders = [
    'Authorization' => 'Bearer ' . getenv('API_TOKEN'),        
    'Accept'        => 'application/json',
];
$apiHost = getenv('API_HOST');
$client = new GuzzleHttp\Client(['verify' => false]);
$recordsField = $config["recordsVariableName"];
$collectionId = $config["collectionId"];
$count = 0;
$result = array();

$records = $data["$recordsField"];

if (count($records) > 0) {
    //post each record to collection
    foreach($records as $record) {
        try {
            $res = $client->request("POST", $apiHost ."/collections/$collectionId/records", [
                "headers" => $pmheaders,
                "json" => [
                    "data" => (array) $record
                    ]
                ]);
            $response = json_decode($res->getBody(), true);
            $result[] = array("record" => $record, "saveStatus" => "Success", "recordId" => $response["id"]);
        } catch(\Exception $e) {
            $result[] = array("record" => $record, "saveStatus" => $e->getMessage());
        }
    }
}
return ["saveResult" => $result];
